result.title: Periodic products lists (7 of 7)
result.description:
A round of 90 European product lists (15 categories averaging three subcategories each) displaying the selections of top energy-efficient products in Europe. Latest version of lists online on www.topten.eu, older versions are stored and will be provided upon request.
At least twice a year. Indicative dates: 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42

result.title: ISO 14001 Certification
result.description: This deliverable will consist in obtaining ISO 14001 certification by an official certification body, that ensures a proper environmental management system in the manufacturing processes in the MAL and RML.
